    Image
    Basic image class, containing a 2D array of Colords.
    IntersectionRecord
    This class is really just a struct, holding necessary information about a particular intersection point.
    Light
    This class represents a basic point light which is infinitely small and emits a constant power in all directions.
    Ray
    A ray is simply an origin point and a direction vector.

    The scene is just a collection of objects that compose a scene.
